long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
This extension is designed to add more to PowerSchool, providing more helpful information. On top of what PowerSchool tells you about your grades, you can see other helpful information such as your GPA, a more detailed grade, how many points you have in a class, how many points you will need to improve your grade, ther average percentage for each assignment, and more.


About: 
I decided to create this extension because I thought that PowerSchool seemed very old and lacked some extremly useful details about your grades. I did not want to have to waste my time trying to manually calculate it. This extension is independently developed by me and was inspired by me and my peers.
